content: cauldron this cauldron ends up being 6 in wide and 4 5 in tall materials 4 5mm hook 4 oz worsted weight black yarn i used red heart yarn needle stitch marker instructions make a magic loop r1 6sc in loop pull loop tight r2 2sc in each st 12 single_crochet r3 *single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st* continue around 18 sts r4 *single_crochet in next 2 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 24 sts r5 *single_crochet in next 3 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 30 sts r6 *single_crochet in next 4 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 36 sts r7 *single_crochet in next 5 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 42 sts r8 *single_crochet in next 6 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 48 sts r9 *single_crochet in next 7 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 54 sts r10 *single_crochet in next 8 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 60 sts r11-14 single_crochet around 60 sts r15 *single_crochet in next 9 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 66 sts r16-17 single_crochet around 66sts r18 *single_crochet in next 10 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 72 sts r19-22 single_crochet around 72 sts r23 *single_crochet in next 10 sts decrease* continue around 66 sts r24 single_crochet around 66 sts r25 *single_crochet in next 9 sts decrease* continue around 60 sts r26 *single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease* continue around 54 sts r27 *single_crochet in next 7 sts decrease* continue around 48 sts r28 *single_crochet in next 3 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 60 sts r29 *single_crochet in next 4 sts 2sc in next st* continue around 72 sts r30 single_crochet around 72sts slip_stitch into first single_crochet of previous round fasten_off weave in end finished
